name: FLUTTER (August Håkansson)
description:
A short experimental narrative, around 10 minutes long.

Arrow keys to move 

Space/left mouse button to skip dialogue 

FLUTTER is inspired by the music of Lightbath. 

Featuring ‘Arcology’ from Selected Public Works, Vol. 3 - now available on Bandcamp.

For other projects, come see me at instagram or twitter. 

Special thanks: 

Leo Köhler 

Melina Scheuermann 

Chris Burton

Jonas Huong Ekholm
